name: ImmGen ATAC Presentation
body:
## About
Presentation given by Caleb Lareau and Hide Yoshida on December 9, 2016. 

## We hope you enjoyed the talk! 
[Slides](https://github.com/buenrostrolab/ImmGenATAC/blob/master/ImmGen_12092016.pptx) are available here.

## Want to interact with the data?
*Some of these pages may take a moment to load*
- Here's a [2D representation of the samples](https://cdn.rawgit.com/buenrostrolab/ImmGen/master/code/networkStuff.html) with select transcription factor deviation scores noted. 
- The sample-sample [correlation heatmaps](https://cdn.rawgit.com/buenrostrolab/ImmGen/master/code/sampleCors.html) can be found here. 
- You can visualize the data in a [UCSC browser instance](http://rstats.immgen.org/Chromatin/chromatin.html).
- mm10 aligned bigwigs, bam files, etc. are available through [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/6uqqftra4x9r0y3/AAA48oF_J5NZosGfL4plnwVNa?dl=0).

## Acknowledgements
We are grateful to Sara Mostafavi, Christophe Benoist, Jason Buenrostro and the members of the ImmGen ATAC working consortium.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
